parameters.Name: query_opened
parameters.Description: Date format: Valid ISO8601 (that means UTC (aka GMT)) (Ex. 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ' -> '2008-12-12T21:35:59Z')

parameters.Name: query_opened_after
parameters.Description: Date format: Valid ISO8601 (that means UTC (aka GMT)) (Ex. 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ' -> '2008-12-12T21:35:59Z')

parameters.Name: query_opened_before
parameters.Description: Date format: Valid ISO8601 (that means UTC (aka GMT)) (Ex. 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ' -> '2008-12-12T21:35:59Z')

parameters.Name: query_closed
parameters.Description: Date format: Valid ISO8601 (that means UTC (aka GMT)) (Ex. 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ' -> '2008-12-12T21:35:59Z')

parameters.Name: query_closed_after
parameters.Description: Date format: Valid ISO8601 (that means UTC (aka GMT)) (Ex. 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ' -> '2008-12-12T21:35:59Z')

parameters.Name: query_closed_before
parameters.Description: Date format: Valid ISO8601 (that means UTC (aka GMT)) (Ex. 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ' -> '2008-12-12T21:35:59Z')

parameters.Name: query_found
parameters.Description: Date format: Valid ISO8601 (that means UTC (aka GMT)) (Ex. 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ' -> '2008-12-12T21:35:59Z')

parameters.Name: query_found_after
parameters.Description: Date format: Valid ISO8601 (that means UTC (aka GMT)) (Ex. 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ' -> '2008-12-12T21:35:59Z')

parameters.Name: query_found_before
parameters.Description: Date format: Valid ISO8601 (that means UTC (aka GMT)) (Ex. 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ' -> '2008-12-12T21:35:59Z')

parameters.Name: query_application_id
parameters.Description: One or more comma seperated application ids

parameters.Name: query_id
parameters.Description: One or more comma seperated vulnerability ids

parameters.Name: query_severity_id
parameters.Description: One or more comma seperated severity ids

parameters.Name: query_dast_class
parameters.Description: One or more comma seperated dast_class entries.

parameters.Name: query_threat
parameters.Description: One or more comma seperated values. Threats have the following range: 1 to 5

parameters.Name: query_score
parameters.Description: One or more comma seperated values. Scores have the following range: 3 to 20

parameters.Name: query_location
parameters.Description: Search for exact file (provide file uri)

parameters.Name: query_location_like
parameters.Description: Search for file locations containing this string of text (provide partial match to file uri)

parameters.Name: query_status
parameters.Description: Combinable options: 'open', 'closed', 'false', 'discovered'

parameters.Name: query_trace_status
parameters.Description: Combinable options: 'open', 'closed', 'false'

parameters.Name: query_impact
parameters.Description: Combinable options: 'urgent', 'critical', 'high', 'medium', 'low'

parameters.Name: query_class
parameters.Description: Looks for Java class: "com.java.class.example"

parameters.Name: query_instance_id
parameters.Description: Look for instance id

parameters.Name: display_stats
parameters.Description: Display stats.

parameters.Name: display_traces
parameters.Description: Display traces.

parameters.Name: display_steps
parameters.Description: Display steps. (Can be very, very slow.)

parameters.Name: display_description
parameters.Description: Display general information about vulnerability. 'custom' option will display custom descriptions.

parameters.Name: display_solution
parameters.Description: Display vulnerability solution information. 'custom' option will display custom solutions.

parameters.Name: page:limit
parameters.Description: Limit results to n number of pages.

parameters.Name: page:offset
parameters.Description: Begin showing results from page number n.

parameters.Name: page:order_by
parameters.Description: Order the results.

parameters.Name: accept_fmt
parameters.Description: Format of returned results.
